## Multiselect.setupInputEl() method

Set the setup function for the input element of the multiselect.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setupInputEl(
        setupInput: (
            this: Multiselect,
            inputEl: HTMLDivElement,
            initializer: (value: string, shouldFocus?: boolean) => unknown
        ) => void
    ): this;
```
